##  About us

Agile Consultants is a talent solutions company in Dubai that focuses on
tapping into the complete potential of individuals and organisations. Our
expert team of recruiters work closely with clients and candidates to ensure
best results in terms of recruitment and successful placement in GCC, Middle
East & Africa regions. Our specialities include but are not limited to Talent
Sourcing, Executive Search, Niche Talent Acquisition, Head Hunting & C-Suite
Hiring. With over 20 years in the United Arab Emirates region, we have built a
strong network of partners and affiliates, allowing us to assist job seekers
and employers with the same passion.

Website

     https://www.agileconsultants.ae/

2mo

    * Report this post 

Agile Consultants: How We Connect Talent with Opportunity Welcome to Agile
Consultants! Our commitment is to bring together the right candidates and
employers without charging any fees to our job seekers at any stage of the
recruitment process. We are supported by our clients for this service. Here is
how we work: 1\. Understanding Client Needs: We start by receiving job details
from our clients. 2\. Spreading the Word: Next, we share these job openings on
various online platforms such as our website, Facebook, LinkedIn, and other
job portals. 3\. Application Invitation: Candidates interested in these roles
should apply directly through our website (www.agileconsultants.ae). 4\.
Reviewing Applications: Our team carefully examines each application to find
candidates who best match the client's requirements. 5\. Candidate
Shortlisting: If your application aligns well with a job, we will include you
in our shortlist and contact you for an initial interview, either by phone or
in person. 6\. Client Presentation: After shortlisting, we send the selected
candidate profiles to our client for their consideration. 7\. Further
Interviews: Candidates chosen by the client are then invited for a direct
interview with them. 8\. Job Offer: Successful candidates will receive a job
offer from the client. 9\. Final Steps: Once a job offer is accepted, we at
Agile Consultants will guide you through the joining process. Please remember,
it's important to apply only for roles that closely match your skills and
experience. Our team works hard to review a large number of applications, and
applying for roles that are not a good fit might lessen your chances of being
shortlisted.

`` ``
